channel.title: Please Get Rid of Truth Potion
channel.description:
It's too op and almost ends up revealing mastermind since hardly any mastermind actually claim sheriff and nearly always ends up finding a player sometimes even n1 the problem with Alchemist is the fact it can now find out classes too quickly and too fast, and tbh I know this is to allow alch to fake claim more but this hardy ever happens as alch normally side with bd.
Please Vote what you believe: [poll type=regular public=true] * I believe right now truth potion is completely viable. * Perhaps all it needs is a nerf or a rework. * It's broken it will either be too op or too weak just delete it or majorly rework it. [/poll]
